recipesJson.name: Flavorah Blood POG
recipesJson.author: RUG_ly
recipesJson.description:
FLV Blood Orange is bright and zesty it provides a nice juice body. 

FLV Passionfruit is tart and slightly floral. 

FLV Pink Guava is uniquely pleasant. It brings an almost strawberry like sweetness with a many body and just the right amount of funky sourness. 

Sweeten to taste. 

This recipe could benefit from cooling or ice. 

Watch the Video here:
https://youtu.be/K1sI4Kkeq4Y
